    %% Connections
    Client --> Core
    Core --> Components
    Core --> Power
    Core --> Data

    Actor <--> Microgrid
    Actor <--> TimeSeries
    Actor <--> Config

    Battery <--> PowerDist
    EVCharger <--> PowerDist
    PV <--> PowerDist
    LogicalMeter <--> PowerDist

    %% Power Management Connections
    PowerDist <--> PowerManage

    Formula <--> TimeSeries

    RingBuffer --> MovingWindow
    MovingWindow --> Resampling
